mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FOOD ( UC_SEQ, MAIN_TITLE, GUGUN_NM, LAT, LNG, PLACE, TITLE, SUBTITLE, ADDR1, ADDR2 , CNTCT_TEL, HOMEPAGE_URL, USAGE_DAY_WEEK_AND_TIME, RPRSNTV_MENU, MAIN_IMG_NORMAL , MAIN_IMG_THUMB, ITEMCNTNTS, AREA) VALUES ( #{uc_seq}, #{main_title}, #{gugun_nm}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{place}, #{title}, #{subtitle}, #{addr1}, #{addr2} , #{cntct_tel}, #{homepage_url}, #{usage_day_week_and_time}, #{rprsntv_menu}, #{main_img_normal} , #{main_img_thumb}, #{itemcntnts}, #{area})

INSERT INTO TB_ATTR ( UC_SEQ, MAIN_TITLE, GUGUN_NM, LAT, LNG, PLACE, TITLE, SUBTITLE, ADDR1 , CNTCT_TEL, HOMEPAGE_URL, TRFC_INFO, USAGE_DAY, HLDY_INFO, USAGE_DAY_WEEK_AND_TIME , USAGE_AMOUNT, MIDDLE_SIZE_RM1, MAIN_IMG_NORMAL, MAIN_IMG_THUMB, ITEMCNTNTS, AREA) VALUES ( #{uc_seq}, #{main_title}, #{gugun_nm}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{place}, #{title}, #{subtitle}, #{addr1} , #{cntct_tel}, #{homepage_url}, #{trfc_info}, #{usage_day}, #{hldy_info}, #{usage_day_week_and_time} , #{usage_amount}, #{middle_size_rm1}, #{main_img_normal}, #{main_img_thumb}, #{itemcntnts}, #{area} )
INSERT INTO TB_PLACE(AREA, GUBUN, UC_SEQ) VALUES( #{area}, #{gubun}, #{uc_seq}) on DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MODIFY_DATE = CURDATE()
